message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $16,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it for $14,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand your position, I am still not able to meet at $15,000. Could we discuss a price closer to $13,000?
